attributes.action: Ban Halal Slaughtering even for "religious reasons"
attributes.additional_details:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YLRXn3hW_8Q&app=desktop&oref=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DYLRXn3hW_8Q%26app%3Ddesktop&has_verified=1 

This video filmed by GAIA exposes the suffering caused by the Halal method of animal slaughter.
attributes.background: the animals are fully conscious and aware of what is happening for several minutes after their throats are cut. Many animals endure several minutes of sheer panic and agony before they die. This slaughter is happening around the world including Europe. It is also happening in the U.K.
